item.title: testing logging
item.description: I have yet to work on a project where we have attempted to test the log statements in the software & I’ve recently found myself asking why. Log statements added by different developers (sometimes guided by a woolly statement on logging in the project coding guidelines) vary in their number, style & usefulness. item.title: about
item.description: This is my blog, {codecrumbs}, about software development. I specialise in Java & have a particular interest in developer testing. I started blogging mainly to help me clarify my own thoughts and perhaps remember them beyond the end of the week. In the unlikely event that it benefits someone else, that’s great.
